title: Hilary Duff has a picnic with husband Matthew Koma and Baby Banks
text:
Hilary Duff was all smiles while having a picnic with fiance Matthew Koma and baby Banks on Monday afternoon.

The 32 year old actress was spotted with her fiance and their first child Banks, who will turn one year old next week.

The happy family were gathered at a local park where they were watching Duff's first child Luca, from her first husband Mike Comrie, have soccer practice.

All smiles: Hilary Duff was all smiles while having a picnic with fiance Matthew Koma and baby Banks on Monday afternoon

Duff was wearing a navy blue floral print top with matching pants while carrying a yellow bag and a blue backpack.

She wore circular black sunglasses under a large olive green hat with black Gucci flip flops.

She carried her phone and a beverage as she was followed by her son Luca who was carrying baby Banks.

Happy family: She carried her phone and a beverage as she was followed by her son Luca who was carrying Baby Bank

Duff was also wearing some gold necklaces and gold earrings while holding Banks, who was drinking milk from a sippy cup while her mother held her.

Koma, a singer, songwriter and DJ, was wearing a grey t-shirt under a navy blue windbreaker and black sweats and white and black running shoes.

He also wore a yellow knit cap and was holding a green water bottle and keys as he walked with his wife.

Mom look: Duff was also wearing some gold necklaces and gold earrings while holding Banks, who was drinking milk from a sippy cup while her mother held her

It was announced in August that Duff will return as her iconic character Lizzie McGuire in a new Disney Plus series.

Duff played the title character in the Disney Channel series Lizzie McGuire from 2001 to 2004, also starring in 2003's The Lizzie McGuire Movie.

Original Lizzie McGuire creator Terri Minsky is also returning for the series, which features an adult McGuire navigating life as a 30 year old in New York City, with the animated version of McGuire popping up to show what she's really thinking.

Happy family: Koma, a singer, songwriter and DJ, was wearing a grey t-shirt under a navy blue windbreaker and black sweats and white and black running shoes

She also stars in the TV Land series Younger, which is slated to air its seventh season in 2020, starring alongside Debi Mazar and Sutton Foster.

She also played slain actress Sharon Tate in the indie drama The Haunting of Sharon Tate, which debuted in April.

The new Lizzie McGuire series is said to debut on the Disney TV Plus streaming series in 2020 though no production schedule was revealed.
